* Floor-to-ceiling windows

This is an apartment in the middle of it all, surrounded by well-established communities in Jumeirah, just minutes away from The Dubai Mall, Downtown, beaches and everything that makes Dubai, Dubai. In walking distance to City Walk Mall, and a superb selection of cafes, restaurants and shopping experiences, along with a wide range of activities and entertainment: The Green Planet, Hub Zero, Roxy Cinema and so much more!
We have a collection of the best apartments available in this incredible project. With just one call to a City Walk specialist, you can see them all. Find the perfect option to meet your needs and budget.

["DescriptionAQUA Properties is pleased to offer this contemporary designed 3-Bedroom apartment available for sale in South Ridge 5, Downtown Burj Khalifa. The unit features an elegantly designed and finished spacious bedrooms, nice bathrooms, large living room connected to an open plan kitchen and the balcony
Description:
* Spacious 3 bedrooms
* BUA: 1,891 sq.ft.
* 4 Bathrooms
* Unfurnished
* Balcony
* Fully equipped open-plan kitchen
* Elegantly designed and finished
* Stunning views of the Burj Khalifa
* Very well-maintained
Amenities and facilities:
* 24/7 security
* CCTV monitored
* Swimming pool
* Fully equipped gymnasium
* High-speed elevators
* Children's playing area
* Park
Residents in South Ridge enjoy a multitude of amenities ranging from a swimming pool, children wading pool and playing area, as well as a state of the art gymnasium. The building features a supermarket, as well as a coffee shop. South Ridge is easily accessible to both highways Sheikh Zayed and Al Khail. The tower is located short seven minutes walk to Dubai Mall."]

The villa is arguably the most popular layout, a Type 3M, which has also been extended front and back and remodelled to include a maids room. Further comprising large living room, open plan kitchen, and huge master bedroom with en-suite overlooking the lake.
This particular villa has been extended at the front and back by the current owner, maximizing the living space resulting in a home ideal for a family.
Reference: DUB134739
Please call Matthew Minett on +971504827882 for more information or to arrange a viewing.']

agents pls excuse

About Pearl Jumeirah
Pearl Jumeirah by Meraas Development is a project with a lot of unique selling points.
Announced in 2010, this is reclaimed land right off Jumeirah which also applies Jumeirah construction by-laws on the peninsula. Even though it is located right off Jumeirah, it has freehold title.
The peninsula offers 300 residential plots and the master-development also incorporates a 90,000 sq. ft. retail area, a mosque, educational facilities and large open spaces.
Many different factors affect prices, such as plot size, location of the plot (sea facing vs internal), original price etc.']

['Unfurnished
Balcony

Kitchen Appliances
Maids Room']
descriptions:
['DescriptionEmirates Hills where this stunning Villa is located, is often referred to as the ‘Beverly Hills’ of the UAE.
Emirates Hills has been meticulously built around the lifestyle and convenience of its residents. The estate continues to be the most exclusive residential address in the city. This particular Villa offers impeccable craftsmanship, a manicured surrounding garden that includes an imported sculptured tree from Argentina, a private outside entertainment area that overlooks the world-class Montgomerie 18-hole Championship Golf Course. 
Emirates Hills is home to Dubai’s wealthy expatriate community and with careful master planning, it continues to attract global property investors and HNWIs as well as families and individuals seeking an unrivaled and sought after standard of living.
Many enticing features of this beautiful villa include 7 luxurious bedrooms all en-suite, 7 bathrooms, guest washroom, two kitchens, separate study, private Jacuzzi, gymnasium, underground parking, water features and so much more. 
Contact Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties on +971504127168 to make an appointment for a viewing.']
